posts.post_content:
I am looking for beater T206's for under $8 per card and up to $20 for beater HOF'ers.  Also looking for a pink Chase and an American Beauty backed T206.  Must be within the specified price range as well.  Let me know if you have anything that fits the bill.
Thanks
I have a true beater Tinker hands on knees.  I think i pd $25 for it; you can have it for $20.  If you want a scan, please send me your emial address.
Thanks to those who have contacted me.  Still looking for more trashed HOF'ers and beater cards.

remember , they are called "well loved";)

great approach:D my friend

good luck

peace

johnny v
Exactly!  Beat and trashed = character and affordability.  Let me know what you have close to that price range.

Still on the lookout for very poor cards under 7 bucks. Please PM me.
Thanks

Hello jon.  I am the proud owner of a true beater bresnahan portrait I can let go for $20let me know, can get you a beater scan....

Keith
Thanks for the replies.  Still on the lookout!
this is a great idea! wish i thought of it. has it been workin for ya? been pickin up much? what have you gotten from this? share! lol

I am also doing a beater run. Been bout a month and I have around 120. Half of which came from a sic deal from a member of this board. i am trying to do 15 and lower for my beaters. 9 - 12 more like it with 15 being a rarer back or something.
Image attached of 8 beaters...   $40 shipped for all 8.  They are just a little too beater for me.
Those are sold to Jon.  Thanks!

[quote name="kilo" post=1112484]this is a great idea! wish i thought of it. has it been workin for ya? been pickin up much? what have you gotten from this? share! lol[/QUOTE]

The BST section and my post here have yielded some good results and one trading buddy.  Unfortunately the availability of very, very low end cards seems to be either feast or famine and either reasonable in cost or way out of line (to me and my budget).  Even if I had the money for high quality cards, I'm not sure they're for me.  I prefer the ripped, beat up, creased cards I have hunted down and dealt for.    

Thanks for the deal CardTarget.  Those will look nice among my trashed T206 collection.
I missed the last lot that came up!  Anyone come across any other beaters they're looking to unload?
A bump for some beaters below $8.  HOF'ers and Southern Leaguers up to $20.
